title: 'Go Ahead reject Celtic bid for winger Breum' - gossip
summary: Celtic reportedly have an offer rejected for Danish winger Jakob Breum as a Scotland squad goalkeeper is told he is being sent out on loan after slipping to fourth choice at his club.
